entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:07 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:07 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 18 except 12 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 in the morning then becoming northeast 20 early in the afternoon. High 18 except 12 near Lake Ontario. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:07 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
